Great DL - tho I forgot quite how AWFUL this movie is, couldn't get further than 10 minutes into it before I started gagging - this has always been one of my favorite books, I've read it 4 times, and this is Stephen King's notoriously HORRIBLY cast and TERRIBLY acted movie series' at their worst. I really don't understand how he could allow garbage like this to be made from his books... Crazy. Great DL though as always JKBlitz - not like its YOUR fault the people who made this were in Kindergarten. Thanks tho!  :)
i hate this movie they need a remake. pet semetery was the best king movie
this movie scared the shit out of me when i saw this when i was like 12. badass movie.

I seem to remember liking this movie up until the end and thought they just ruined it! but it's been years so I'll watch it again. and by the way billnie "Christine" was Stephen King's best movie by far!! ;)
Brilliant film. shame about the ending though.
